column3: What is it needed for? Does something called inside AvailableCoins need/acquire the cs_main lock?\n
AvailableCoins() calls IsFinalTx() which requires cs_main\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/ea3acaf383ade60d39643b786db5b6942b8b7991 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
